## Public Member Functions

### canMaterialize() {#ab7c9a6cfa5fb504c692e5e3a9abb2698}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool RegBankSelect::EdgeInsertPoint::canMaterialize () const"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> whether this insertion point can be materialized.

As soon as <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/insertpoint/#a7a0275cf0b23f61fed8b27a60dd950a5">getPoint</a> is called and thus, the point materialized calling this method does not make sense.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00309">309</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp/#l00970">970</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp">RegBankSelect.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### frequency() {#a2128bef8edaf9b2e731de12723929db8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t RegBankSelect::EdgeInsertPoint::frequency (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> &amp; P) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Frequency of the insertion point.

<code>P</code> is used to access the various analysis that will help to get that information, like <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineblockfrequencyinfo">MachineBlockFrequencyInfo</a>. If <code>P</code> does not contain enough to return the actual frequency, this returns 1.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00308">308</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp/#l00950">950</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp">RegBankSelect.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isSplit() {#a8b302cda9a867539728750096e0b1e1e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::RegBankSelect::EdgeInsertPoint::isSplit () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Does this point involve splitting an edge or block?

As soon as <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/insertpoint/#a7a0275cf0b23f61fed8b27a60dd950a5">getPoint</a> is called and thus, the point materialized, the point will not require splitting anymore, i.e., this will return false.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00304">304</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### materialize() {#ac0a5ac484839aba76ad0edd512ba965c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void RegBankSelect::EdgeInsertPoint::materialize ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Materialize the insertion point.

If <a href="#a8b302cda9a867539728750096e0b1e1e">isSplit()</a> is true, this involves actually splitting the block or edge.


<SectionUser title="Postcondition">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/insertpoint/#af81657c35d5dd8aea4fc76cf2566d6a0">getPointImpl()</a> returns a valid iterator.
</SectionUser>


<SectionUser title="Postcondition">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/insertpoint/#a4acd081c2e07b76bc2d5a5b5144ea937">getInsertMBBImpl()</a> returns a valid basic block.
</SectionUser>


<SectionUser title="Postcondition">
<a href="#a8b302cda9a867539728750096e0b1e1e">isSplit()</a> == false ; no more splitting should be required.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00286">286</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp/#l00937">937</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp">RegBankSelect.cpp</a>.

### DstOrSplit {#a15c4bcc248be7399b54613013efad8ac}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineBasicBlock&#42; llvm::RegBankSelect::EdgeInsertPoint::DstOrSplit</>}>
Destination of the edge.

After the materialization is done, this hold the basic block that resulted from the splitting.
